Title: Relates to the New York state higher education capital matching grant board
Summary: Requires the New York state higher education capital matching grant board to award matching capital grants totaling two million dollars for projects to implement, modify, or otherwise enhance cyber security infrastructure; makes related provisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part U of chapter 57 of the laws of 2005 amending the labor law and other laws relating to implementing the state fiscal plan for the 2005-2006 state fiscal year, in relation to the New York state higher education capital matching grant board
